WRITING.TEXT: Anyone know when this will be released for purchase? I drove it last night for the heist and I want one now!

WRITING.TEXT: Thanks dude, my fingers already worn away from hitting spin.

WRITING.TITLE: Any love for my Rebla GTS? Show me some of your favorite "realistic" cars below! 0_0

WRITING.TEXT: I'm taking that as a compliment seeing as I strive to make my GTA cars as realistic as possible! Thanks dude.

WRITING.TITLE: Another wonderful delivery provided by Johnny on the Spot!

WRITING.TEXT: ... Cars that look like cars from the "rEaL wOrLd".

WRITING.TITLE: Grotti Itali GTO, probably the most underappreciated car on the game.

WRITING.TEXT: It's not completely fixed, it still bounces! That's why I like it!
That's why I like it! It seems to respond to pot holes and changes in the road more realistically than all the sports/super cars in the game.

Thanks for the Reddit lesson, I've seen the kind of thing your talking about unfold in a few feeds. I guess to further clarify the things I wish to see: I want land vehicles that bear an uncanny resemblance to real life production models that you are likely to see on the roads. I understand that the Ferrari's and Lambo's are all very accurate but everyone's got them in game. I want cars that would retail UNDER #163;100k. #8203; In fact, I think you've given me a nice idea for a thread but I will be a bit more precise this time!
I think we all know that if you are looking for the vehicle with the most effective gameplay you wouldn't choose a vehicle with wheels at all!

gt;Exhibit A: Oppressor MkII Exhibit B: Oppressor MkII Exhibit C: Oppressor MkII Exhibit D: Oppressor MkII etc... etc.. Don't get me wrong, u/PSN-BronzeWaffle is right with regards to racing and for anyone looking to use a land vehicle for grinding. But for me, whenever I'm in my car it's because I have no urgent matters to attend to and I'm just enjoying the drive.
Even now this car requires a certain understanding of the driving mechanics in the game, it's fun to drive but not easy!
Yeah the Schlangen is probably my favorite on the game, quite underappreciated as well because it doesn't look like a generic sports car. Car guys recognize it straight away as the AMG GT

WRITING.TITLE: Remote play in work because I've been waiting TOO LONG for the Sultan Classic!

WRITING.TEXT: I wouldn't rely on it for regular play but I can just about drive to the mod shop when I want to do a new car!

WRITING.TITLE: I just realized that because we just got the Sultan Classic; we're going to be waiting another million years for the Kanjo.

WRITING.TEXT: Well hopefully, because Rock\* probably think that the community wants F1 cars more than the classic shit boxes. They MIGHT release the F1's last and give us the Kanjo soon. Either way I'm still happy they're releasing these kind of cars.

GTA Online
Didn't notice that!
Not intentional but thanks! Loving this car; its got a very unique drive style to it.
Take the pic a little higher so we can see the features a bit better. Good to see you opting for the higher suspension and looks good with the roof box!

WRITING.TITLE: Clean X5 build.
Clock watching at work; daydreaming about another evening spent building my criminal enterprise in Los Santos.
New Livery for the Speedo Custom!

WRITING.TEXT: It sure seems like that sometimes, but I must say I'm starting to see the benefits of owning all of these old businesses and warehouses now that we have the MCT in the Arcade.
Would have been a better caption.

thanks for the roast u/Brooksy925 I think they look cool. u/Bagofsquishystuff Yeah man, I just hate the look of the full armor and mostly grind in solo public so it's not an issue. The mini gun is brilliant for the sell missions where you have to protect the buyer from waves of jeeps, apart from that it just sits there as quite an eyesore.
Just realized you mean the Lambo Urus right!? Because in the UK we have a car called a Yaris and it is quite the opposite to this beast!

which I've only just realized makes perfect sense because the map is based on LA (Los Angeles). Angels and Saints are pretty similar so its basically the same name but in a different language. I wonder if this is just coincidence or another bit of genius from R\*?
Those Cacti are awesome!
I like it, keep it up!

WRITING.TITLE: Rockstar: How can we diversify our setup missions? Oh wait, I got it! Put the two bags they normally collect in the back of a Hearse and have them steal that instead!

WRITING.TEXT: The Stirling GT has the nicest sounding engine on the game imo, I've driven that more than any sports/super!
It's pretty useful to stay under the radar when searching the casino valet guy, but I don't understand why we can't just grab the bags and make off in our own car.

Yeah I understand that the bags just contain the outfits and I guess keeping the Hearse is the way you blend in when you get to the morgue. The part I find the most ironic is that you turn up to the morgue in the same Hearse (same plates) that was literally stolen 10 minutes ago from a local funeral directors. Except it's all smashed up and covered in bullet holes. If anything it would be more sneaky to just turn up in the outfits and leave the smashed up and recently stolen Hearse round the corner! Which I guess brings me back to my point; the Hearse is a pointless addition to this setup because if it's necessary to stay undetected then it should also be necessary to fix and re-plate the thing! Well that was a mouthful.
Caught out for the fake post! ouch.

WRITING.TITLE: Why can't I get all Access Points in the setup for Diamond Casino Heist?
WRITING.TEXT: I was wondering if anyone could help: I have completed the Heist maybe 5-6 times now and every single time a start a new setup the "scope all access points" stays un-ticked. So obviously every time I start a new heist I have another go at getting it ticked as the "scope all points of interest" IS ticked. I have followed a few different guides online and I'm confident that all known access points and points of interest have been photographed and sent to Lester. STILL NO TICK! Has this happened to anyone else before that may be able to help me solve it? Thanks in advance for any advice or upvotes (for exposure)
I can trim your armour for you mate, just accept trade.
Will do guys, just in work at the moment but I'll be online as soon as i get in... obviously
I thought it could have been this but Yung Ancestor isn't available for 2 of the approaches and this problem applies to all approaches.
I've honestly tried this a few times now but I have pictured every one, this includes scrolling through all cameras in the cctv in case any were in there.

No blanks, all multi-slots filled according to basically all guides online. I guess I'm just hoping someone else has had the same problem so I know it's not just me that's triggered some stupid glitch.
I used Yung Ancestor the very first time so I have done it before, but it's not an option on the other two heists.
Old Camera? I've started to think that maybe my heist board is just bugged yeah.

This is for sure what #8217;s happened to me, I #8217;ve taken 20+ photos of every door and camera on the roof it #8217;s ridiculous. It doesn #8217;t seem to hinder my heist performance but it #8217;s just for the OCD of having the tick I guess.
These two games pretty much sum up my childhood.

WRITING.TITLE: I had a dream that Rock* added a Speedometer and a Fuel Gauge to the bottom right of the screen, fuel consumption was relative to the car that I was driving and I had the ability to call my mechanic and "Fix Up" my vehicles cosmetic and performance damage at the side of the road! Best. Dream. Ever.

WRITING.TEXT: An odometer would also be wonderful!

I know that this isn #8217;t everyone #8217;s idea of the perfect GTA, this is just mine. I also know GTA isn #8217;t a RP game either, but it did basically make its name by being #8220;true to life #8221; so it #8217;s not a completely outrageous thought to imagine R* implementing something like a fuel mechanic. Thanks for the opinions everyone! #128077; #127995;
Fair enough, I #8217;m a big fan of the #8220;realistic #8221; parts of the game so I #8217;d say this would be realistic and fun.

I would agree with you but this is GTA, which is literally a game based on reality so I think an obvious step would be to add things like that. Oh and we #8217;re all wasting our time mate playing video games
Grotti Italia GTO
Happiness is subjective bro, your happiness is telling other people that their happiness is sad; and that #8217;s okay!

Ahh okay, but once again; you may pity someone #8217;s life choices because they don #8217;t suit your personal preference but that bares no relevance to how they feel about it. For instance; you are showing a desire to share pity for others on reddit in your free time which once again is okay. But it #8217;s not something I would ever be interested in spending my time doing. Have a great day dude.

Thanks dood It #8217;s just persistence really and deep pockets (in chips) It #8217;s gone straight back into my research at the bunker because I want the different types of rounds!

WRITING.TITLE: Rockstar put the Italian racing stripe the wrong way round on the Furia. #127470; #127481;

WRITING.TEXT: True, but is it not standard for it to be front facing?
So the other one is incorrect when you #8217;re behind the wheel?

Although that was slightly moronic, it makes sense too: For example if you saw the Furia in your rear view the flag would be the right way round, likewise if you were stood behind the car it would show the correct way too. THE THICK PLOTTENS!
No! Don't do this to me!
EDIT: I know that the Italian flag is the wrong way round, it's just a nice picture.

Google the Italian Flag, you #8217;ll find it goes green, white then red. It #8217;s been discussed that the Furia #8217;s stripe is correct from the rear of the vehicle but head on the colours are the wrong way round.

Absolutely Wonderful! Thanks for sharing! I would humbly suggest 1 or 2 Hillstream Loaches, They are super cute and help to keep your glass amp; substrate clean! WRITING.TITLE: Slowmo Hoplo.
I #8217;ve been admiring this subreddit for some time whilst getting into the hobby myself, so here #8217;s my humble 100L setup. Comments welcome.

WRITING.TEXT: Substrate: Only Sand Filter: EHEIM Pickup 200 Fishy Friends: 2 x Albino Paradise Fish 10 x Odessa Barb 3 x Hoplo Catfish 1 x Wild Caught Pleco Non-Fishy Friends: 2 x Clam 2 x Nerite Snail 2 x Moss Ball (too cute and fluffy to not be a friend)
